item.title: Last day to file an on-line Degree Application via SIS for December 31, 2024 graduation.
item.description: Friday, October 11, 2024 (all day) Where: Campus-wide Description: Last day to file an on-line Degree Application via SIS for December 31, 2024 graduation. Contact: Office of the Registrar 518-276-6231

item.title: Late Degree application (paper) for December 2024 graduation, if did not apply in SIS, will begin being accepted.
item.description: Saturday, October 12, 2024 - Thu , October 24, 2024 (all day) Where: Campus-wide Description: Late Degree application (paper) for December 2024 graduation, if did not apply in SIS, will begin being accepted. Contact: _none 518-276-6000

item.title: Columbus Day/Indigenous Peoples' Day. No classes.
item.description: Saturday, October 12, 2024 - Thu , October 24, 2024 (all day) Where: Campus-wide Description: Late Degree application (paper) for December 2024 graduation, if did not apply in SIS, will begin being accepted. Contact: _none 518-276-6000

item.title: Consultation weeks. Advisement for Spring 2025 registration. Students should consult with their faculty advisors
item.description: Monday, October 21, 2024 - Fri , November 1, 2024 (all day) Where: Campus-wide Description: Consultation weeks. Advisement for Spring 2025 registration. Students should consult with their faculty advisors Contact: Office of the Registrar 518-276-6231

item.title: Last day to file a late degree application (paper) for December 2024 graduation. Doctoral dissertations for December 2024 graduation applicants, due to advisors
item.description: Friday, October 25, 2024 (all day) Where: Campus-wide Description: Last day to file a late degree application (paper) for December 2024 graduation. Doctoral dissertations for December 2024 graduation applicants, due to advisors Contact: _none 518-276-6000
